programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Age of Steam
programme.sub-title: The Age of the Steam Locomotive
programme.desc: Fred Dibnah tells the story of the revolution in transport brought about by steam power, from the earliest colliery railways to the end of steam operation on Britains rail network in the 1960s.

programme.title: Pubs, Ponds, and Power: The Story of the Village
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson unlocks the ancient roots of the Northumberland village of Warkworth. With the help of locals, he discovers clues that point back almost 1,000 years to the Norman conquest and how the invaders laid the foundations of a planned community, still visible to this day.

programme.title: Inside Classical
programme.sub-title: Halloween Spooktacular with BBC National Orchestra of Wales
programme.desc: Join presenter and musician Owain Wyn Evans for a concert full of Halloween tricks and treats. The BBC National Orchestra of Wales, conducted by Ellie Slorach, perform music that is guaranteed to give you a thrill.The concert includes Bachs gothic masterpiece Toccata and Fugue in D minor, Saint-Saëns Danse Macabre and the spine-tingling Rimsky Korsakovs arrangement of Mussorgskys Night on the Bare Mountain.

programme.title: Man Alive
programme.desc: Man Alive speaks to couples who have decided not to take the traditional route towards marriage. Some have been married before but are unable to obtain the divorces they need, while others just see marriage as an outdated concept.

programme.title: Man Alive
programme.desc: Reporter Gillian Strickland and a Man Alive team take a typical office and film the preparations for the annual party, the spree itself and the aftermath.

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: JK Galbraith examines WWI as an instrument for social change, looking especially at Lenin, who spent most of the war exiled in Switzerland urging soldiers to start a world revolution.

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martel is in St Helens, Merseyside to see a three bed mid terrace with some pretty ominous signs of damp. Shes also in a rural part of West Lothian in Scotland to see a four bed detached house that really has seen better days, but has the potential to be a beautiful family home. Martin is in Launceston in Cornwall where a one bed flat with a wonderful view but a short lease is on offer.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In Manchester, Caroline Hawley visits an Aladdins cave of fabric swatches dating back to the late 1700s. The Print Pattern Archive Studio has more than 50,000 pieces of material and wallpaper, spanning entire eras in fashion and design. Caroline meets the archives owner Cheryl OMeara, who was gifted this incredible collection by New York textile curator Marlene Goldstein. Over in Oswestry, two teams of best friends try to fashion a profit.

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Nick Stapleton are back, working with ethical hacker Jim Browning to call out the scammers plaguing our lives and prevent people from losing their money. In this episode, the team are in a high-octane chase to intercept scammers claiming to be from Sky broadband. They have full access to a womans mobile and are only seconds away from transferring her cash. But the scammers are on to us and want answers.

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma receives dodgy life advice from her incarcerated sister Catherine and Rita, her alcoholic boss. Worried that she will be having the baby alone, Gemma enlists Cherry to help her find a suitable, ideally rich, father for her unborn child. Meanwhile, Malcolm thinks he has found love with a woman online. Gemma educates him on the perils of catfishing - but Derek encourages Malcolm to meet her.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Gemma attends birthing classes led by a very eccentric antenatal teacher. Realising she needs more support, she seeks advice from her aunt Jess, Malcolms sister. She and Malcolm get invited to Jess and her domineering husband Tyrones new house for a party, but Malcolm is scared of Tyrone, who intimidates him with his new hot tub.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Kat wrestles with a decision as a discovery weighs heavily on her, Julie helps George see a situation from a different perspective, and Ross confides in Alfie.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Kats revelation sends shockwaves through The Vic, Suki and Eve take a positive step, and Oscar turns detective.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Halloween gets off to a bad start in The Vic, Anthony steps in to defuse a situation, and Eve faces a new hurdle.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As Halloween night continues, a situation escalates in The Vic.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As morning breaks, breakfast proves to be a wakeup call for the Faithful as the Traitors strike again.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: As the game nears the end, the murders become increasingly harder for the Traitors, and time is running out to increase the final prize pot.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined once again by Series 1 Traitor Wilf and Series 3 Traitor Minah, as well as the latest murdered and banished players. Expect all the latest analysis, gossip and predictions from episode 7.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed Gamble is joined by Series 3 winner Jake, and the two of them are accompanied on the sofa by the latest banished and murdered players from the game.

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: Paranormal: The Girl, the Ghost and the Gravestones
programme.desc: Sian Eleri investigates a seemingly ordinary farmhouse in north Wales, which, in the late 1990s, was widely considered the most haunted house in Britain. The story made local and national headlines as the family who lived at the farm became ever more desperate in their search for answers. More than 300 allegedly paranormal events were documented at the Flintshire farmhouse in video footage, audio interviews, photos and eyewitness accounts - all of which has been locked away until now.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: After a three-minute video featuring a female prison officer and an inmate having sex inside HMP Wandsworth goes viral, award-winning journalist Mobeen Azhar begins an investigation into what happened and why. A year of twists, turns and damning revelations pulls back the curtain on a dangerous wider world of coercion, corruption and contraband thriving behind bars.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Tian Eleri investigates the story of Scottish medium Helen Duncan, who in 1944 became the last person convicted and imprisoned under the Witchcraft Act. As the Blitz rained down on London, Helen went on trail at the Old Bailey.

programme.title: Paranormal: Britains Last Witch
programme.desc: Theres an unnerving breakthrough in Sians investigation into a woman who claimed to summon spirits of the dead when she finds an audio recording of a Helen Duncan seance. Not only is a gravelly male spirit heard to speak, but the people gathered comment that they see and recognise him. How is this possible? Sian tests out different theories - was it someone else speaking?

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Alex Scott joins Rattus for a special sport-themed show, marking the 2020 Olympics. The original Olympics werent actually much to do with sport at all, and so our show begins in Ancient Greece, where the Festival Committee is looking to pep-up its Religious Festival celebrating Zeus with the inclusion of some new events? and who better to help them figure out what those events should be than Sophie and Sebastian?! Did you know that sport has been banned at various times in History?

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are challenged to knock down a row of derelict houses in less time than it takes a team of demolition experts to do the same job. Meanwhile, Jeremy tests an updated version of the classic Jensen Interceptor and finds himself transported back to a 1970s world of leather driving gloves and droopy moustaches. Plus, another celebrity tries their hand in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Anthony, a visual artist, meets an old-timer who exposes the true story behind Candyman. Anxious to use these macabre details as fresh grist for paintings, he unknowingly unleashes a terrifying wave of violence.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are challenged to knock down a row of derelict houses in less time than it takes a team of demolition experts to do the same job. Meanwhile, Jeremy tests an updated version of the classic Jensen Interceptor and finds himself transported back to a 1970s world of leather driving gloves and droopy moustaches. Plus, another celebrity tries their hand in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Birminghams Hockley Social Club has been transformed into our very own comedy club. Taking to the stage are Eli Hart, Farhan Solo, Chloe Reynolds, Will BF and Monica Hsueh in a bid to impress our judges and book their place in the final. Award-winning comedian and writer Sarah Keyworth is here to keep the house in order. The judges are comedian, writer and podcaster Aurie Styla and local Brum stand-up Lindsey Santoro. Head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri completes the trio.

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: The BBCs big comedy talent search, the New Comedy Awards is scouring the country to uncover the hottest new stand-ups. Ee head to the capital and the historic Alexandra Palace, home of the BBCs first broadcast. Five comics will battle it out to book their place in this years grand final showdown, where one will be crowned the BBC New Comedian of 2025. Hosting the comedy extravaganza is comedian, actor, presenter and writer Sara Pascoe.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
programme.desc: As Mobeens investigation deepens, it becomes clearer that illicit relationships between prisoners and jail staff are just the tip of the iceberg. The bigger story involves organised criminal gangs determined to cash in on a lucrative prison drug economy. When news breaks of a prison governor being jailed for a relationship with a drug-dealing gang boss, Mobeen becomes determined to uncover the true extent of criminal influence inside our prisons.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: For three police recruits in Belfast, the pressure is immense. Facing criminal gangs and divided communities, they dont know who to trust.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: Join the City Church, Cardiff, for their International Sunday Service, a weekly gathering that brings together people from diverse cultures for worship, biblical teaching and reflection.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Anita Rani and Sean Fletcher explore the magnificent Chatsworth Estate in Derbyshire - 35,000 acres of farmland, woodland and meadows with the River Derwent running through its heart.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.desc: Derek explores castles near Cardiff, the coast of Gower and the relics of the River Wye.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: Its tupping time on Cammys farm, the beginning of the yearly cycle for sheep farmers. Dougies near Alva in Clackmannanshire visiting some pedigree American Highland cattle.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: Alexina Anatole has an elevated and lighter version of Sunday roast with roasted chicken on a bed of beer-braised onions served with a fresh kale, ricotta and grapefruit salad. Mary McCartney serves up smoky dogs with caramelised balsamic onions, ketchup and mustard, which are given Hollywood approval by Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Nadiyas British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiya returns to Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years, to discover the people preserving old, local traditions and others creating new ones. First off she meets Frank Powell who fishes the beaches near Bridlington twice a day.

programme.title: The Great Food Guys
programme.desc: Chef Nick Nairn and Dougie Vipond look at Asian fusion and cook up salt-chili squid with a Vietnamese dipping sauce. Joining them in the kitchen are award-winning chef Kaori Simpson, from the Harajuku Kitchen in Edinburgh, and actor Greg McHugh, who brings along his choice of craft beer to accompany the food.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater creates simple but delicious meals from ingredients that are often overlooked, including a lentil and chard stew.

programme.title: Whisky Galore!
programme.desc: Classic Ealing comedy about a scotch-laden ship that runs aground off the coast of the Outer Hebrides during the Second World War. The local islanders have depleted their supply of the amber nectar and are overjoyed at the thought of stocking up again. However, it is Sunday, and the teetotallers object to making free with the unexpected cargo.

programme.title: Match of the Day LIVE
programme.sub-title: FA Cup, First Round: Eastleigh v Walsall
programme.desc: Eastleigh take on Walsall in the first round of the 2025-65 FA Cup.

programme.title: Alison Hammonds Florida Unpacked
programme.desc: Alison and Aidan step into an 80s-style Florida attraction, snack on quirky popcorn, and time-travel further for budget-friendly knights, horses and epic medieval fun.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team are in Reading in Berkshire, where antiques experts Anita Manning and Nick Davies put values on the towns antiques and collectibles. Anita falls in love with a couple of American dolls and Nick finds some 19th-century French paperweights which get pulses racing at the auction.

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights from the first round of the FA Cup.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Long-term mates Joe Wilkinson and Zoe Lyons, whove travelled to gigs together for years, take on the wilds of eastern Turkey.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The team are on an epic road trip across the western side of the United States in three front-engined supercars. With Jeremy Clarkson in a Lexus LFA, Richard Hammond driving the new Dodge Viper and James May choosing the latest Aston Martin Vanquish a glorious soundtrack is guaranteed, as are furious arguments about which is best as the trio head from Las Vegas to Los Angeles and on to Palm Springs.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.sub-title: Rivers Towi and Cothi, Carmarthenshire: Sea Trout
programme.desc: A fishing trip down memory lane beckons for Paul and Bob as they re-visit the fishing spots Paul used to go to many years previously with his father. This is a special and very personal trip for Paul and with trusty Ted in tow, they venture deep into the Welsh countryside to fish the confluence of the beautiful rivers Towy and Cothi for fresh sea trout.

programme.title: Daisy May and Charlie Coopers NightWatch
programme.desc: Daisy May and Charlie Cooper stay overnight in a reportedly haunted 16th-century pub in the Midlands, but will they need a drink or two to make it to the morning?

programme.title: Later ... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: Jools Holland brings together hot, legendary and undiscovered artists for live studio performances, interviews and musical magic.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: An English butlers professional and emotional life is examined retrospectively during a journey towards a reunion with the housekeeper he loved years before. He recalls his lengthy unquestioned service with a reactionary, pro-Nazi aristocrat, and his painfully unfulfilled relationship with the woman he is going to meet.

programme.title: When Eight Bells Toll
programme.desc: Philip Calvert is a tough navy secret service agent called in to track down gold bullion smugglers. He follows the trail to Greek tycoon Sir Anthony Skouras yacht off the Scottish coast, but are his suspicions right?

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Jurassic Bear; Extreme Fitness; Domestic Robots; Mass Control; Bear Under Control; Popcorn Party; Dancing with the Bears; Role Change; Lemming Tonic
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Seepod; The Disappearing Mushler; Bouncing Back; Morel in the Dark; Save The Fun Tree
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Getting Truffy With It; Good Vibrations; Puffs Perfect Picnic; Run, Mushpie, Run
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Moley
programme.sub-title: Wormalicious; Keeper for a Day; For All Molekind; Molerskating Mayhem
programme.desc: Moley vows to not eat worms for a few days in support of Dottys veganism and his worm craving temptations get out of control. When Moley spends the day with a young mole who wants to be just like him, he helps Cheese recognise his own talents.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: Bowled Over; Home Movie; Sample Sale; Fish Sitting
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy go bowling - but his fingers get stuck in a ball! Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star! Mr Bean takes free food samples from a food truck and sells them to raise funds for a teapot.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.sub-title: Telepathic Tabby; Shoe-In; Its a Gift; Stormin the Doorman; The Great Donut Robbery; Torpedont; Billboard Jumble; Horticulture Clash
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry settle in to their new digs at the Royal Gate Hotel and unleash mayhem across the Big Apple, inciting chaos uptown, downtown and everywhere their manic escapades take them.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cat and Mouse Detective
programme.sub-title: Snow Brawl; Giant Problems; A Class of Their Own; All Cat Jazz; Always Say Never Again; Art of the Deal
programme.desc: A simple snowball fight escalates into an all-out snow war when snowman versions of Tom and Jerry come to life. Papa regales the Bavarian mouse trio with his own fractured version of the Jack and the Beanstalk story.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Bottled Up Emotions; Scrunch Time; All that Glitters
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry, a cat and mouse, attempt to outwit one another as they weave through Singapore, exploring the citys modern skyscrapers, colourful neighbourhoods and luscious city-in-nature experiences.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: When You Leash Expect It; Whack a Gopher; Vocal Yokel; Vegged Out; Vanishing Creamed; Vampire State
programme.desc: Life is a never-ending cat-and-mouse game for Tom and Jerry, with their shenanigans spawning chaos, laughter and occasional moments of collaboration.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.sub-title: Top of the Heap; Stunt Double Trouble; Surfer Supreme; Kabuki Cat; Too Much Monkey Business; Doggie Championship; Snow Day; Toots the Terrible
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry settle in to their new digs at the Royal Gate Hotel and unleash mayhem across the Big Apple, inciting chaos uptown, downtown and everywhere their manic escapades take them.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.sub-title: Calypso Cat; The Two Mouseketeers; Professor Tom; Dr. Jekyll And Mr. Mouse; Tot Watchers; Love That Pup
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry, a cat and mouse, attempt to outwit one another as they weave through Singapore, exploring the citys modern skyscrapers, colourful neighbourhoods and luscious city-in-nature experiences.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: Dancing Bean; Funfair; Special Delivery; Staycation
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Best of Jerry
programme.sub-title: 24 Karat Kat; A Game of Bones; A Head For Science; A Kick in the Butler; A Life Less Guarded; A Snootful
programme.desc: Featuring some of Jerrys best moments.

programme.title: Supertato

programme.title: Football Fantastics

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Leos family is from Russia, and they have shown him how to make a special sharlotka, a simple Russian apple cake. Leo starts by separating the eggs. He then adds sugar and flour to the yolks and mixes them together until the mixture is smooth.

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: Mr Hammond has been up all night in the Jungle Den at Safari World looking through his tape collection of animal sounds he recorded on a trip down the mighty Mississippi river in North America. Andy offers to help.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how ivy plays an important role in the environment. They find out that ivy is an evergreen plant, so it provides shelter the whole year round to insects, birds and other animals. They learn that it can also be a food source for lots of creatures, like birds, which eat the ivys berries in winter. On the way, they walk like dinosaurs and spot a spider who has spun its web in the ivy.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar give fruit bats some breakfast and watch them fly around in the dark. The next animal they meet is the barn owl, which lives in a very similar way to the bats.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School

programme.title: Octonauts

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Lars and Glitch team up and build a fruit-picking machine that runs on methane to help with the Academy harvest. When they run low on fuel, they head to the natural methane deposits of Azerbaijan to stock up. But when the Grimbots take too much methane from a huge volcano, the Go Jetters must work to protect the tourists and save the Grimbots from a fiery explosion.

programme.title: Love Monster

First, they must decide whether objects will float or sink in a water tank. Then theres a healthy eating quiz based on the food groups that make up a balanced diet. Finally, the teams dress as bees with sticky legs to transfer pollen between giant flowers. Meanwhile, Ayo wants to discover a planet just like one of her heroes, astronomer Sara Seager.

programme.title: Piggy Builders

programme.title: Puffin Rock

programme.desc: Monica and Chandler disagree over how to redecorate Rachels old room, and despite Phoebes admonitions, Ross makes a drastic decision about Rachel.

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: While Arya makes progress in her training, Sansa confronts an old friend. Elsewhere, Cersei faces a struggle and Jon embarks on a journey.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy based on George RR Martins best-selling book.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy based on George RR Martins best-selling book.

programme.title: True Detective: Night Country
programme.desc: Liz and Evangeline face their demons from the past as they try to find out about eight lost men in Alaska.

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Detective Jimmy McNulty - exiled to police boat duty - finds the body of a woman floating in the Baltimore harbour. Bodie drives to Philly to make a connection for the Barksdale crew, and Stringer Bell takes the train to New York to feel out the crews reticent suppliers.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The saga of a fictional, American global-media family that is not only rich and powerful but also powerfully dysfunctional.

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Sophie comes to terms with her fathers accountability and asserts her own independence.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony B. and Christopher unearth some old memories; Tony and Carmela plan another party; Janice is sent to anger management therapy.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: Following the events in the 1960s, the time leading up to the events of the first film in the Stephen King "It" series.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An embittered Indian scout attempts to escort a homesteaders wife and her son back to safety after her cowardly husband deserts her during an Apache attack. When she refuses to go, the scout stays on to help for a while and, over time, forms a strong bond with both her and her son.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Boonie Bears: Guardian Code
programme.desc: Briar and Bramble lose their mother at a very young age under mysterious circumstances. Many years later, logger Vick takes the bears to visit the Robot Research Institute, and they uncover a clue relating to their mother.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog Snowy buy a model of a three-masted sailing ship `The Unicorn at a market and are immediately accosted by two people who both want to buy the model from Tintin. Tintin takes the model ship home and is later shot at and then kidnapped on board a ship with Snowy. Will they escape in time, and solve the mystery of the secret of the Unicorn?

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: Whimsical but engaging western about a drifter who saves a woman from a gang of marauders. The cowboy is astonished to learn that the woman is a nun, especially when he witnesses her heavy drinking and cigar-smoking ways. The unlikely pair embark on a voyage of discovery as they become embroiled in the Mexican War.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Marmee is the head of the March household in the absence of her husband, whos away fighting in the US Civil War. Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

Her daughters range from the headstrong Jo and sweet Beth, to domesticated Meg and wilful Amy. The film follows the trials and tribulations of the girls, from early poverty and tragedy to Jos later efforts to secure both a husband and a successful writing career, and Amys relationship with an old family friend.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. programme.title: Schindlers List

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Galaxy Quest

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.
When Earth is destroyed by mechanical monsters, nine sackcloth dolls are all that remain. Can they triumph against the machines?

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Lemony Snickets A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are sent to live with their uncle Count Olaf, but he only wants their family fortune. What follows is a battle of wits.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Woman in the Yard

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Aaron Falk goes back home to his drought-stricken town to attend a tragic funeral. However, his return reopens the door to the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish library clerk working for a CIA front is hunted after he stumbles across a covert intelligence operation. Returning from lunch, he finds the entire office massacred. programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is cleaning the clockhouse so Tommy and Tallulah take their jammy sandwiches to their room to eat. How can they talk her down safely?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: Animal Senses

programme.desc: Some animals have senses that humans cant even conceive. With those powers they can do marvellous things.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Nearly every species on Earth must find a mate and while some become partners for life, for others its just a fleeting moment.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: All airborne creatures embark on remarkable journeys through the air, some routes are short and others across hundreds of miles.

programme.title: Age of Big Cats
programme.desc: The era of the saber-tooth is over and the biggest big cats ever, the lion and the tiger, become the kings of their respective habitats.

programme.title: Age of Big Cats
programme.desc: Changes the planet has undergone affects big cats, from the almost complete disappearance of American wildlife to the rise of man, and threatens their survival.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobes banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Journey
programme.desc: Follow David Attenborough around the globe as he films David Attenboroughs First Life.

programme.title: Alien Abyss
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Alien Abyss
programme.desc: Exploring the bizarre mating rituals of the oceans most peculiar creatures. Learning how bloody battles for mates, gender bending, and super-size litters of babies might secure a next generation for these animals.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobes banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it.

programme.title: The Predators Playbook
programme.desc: An exploration of the unique features that allow predators to survive in often hostile environments,. such as speed and agility to undetectable camouflage.

programme.title: Wild Crusades
programme.desc: Dr Wolfgang Dittus explores the complex society of the toque macaque population in Sri Lanka. These feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth, and are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken.

programme.title: Animals Decoded
programme.desc: Animals use an array of languages to flirt, fight, chat and bond.

programme.title: Animals Decoded
programme.desc: From the trumpeting of enormous elephants to the chatter of seal colonies, discover some of the remarkable ways that animals speak to one another.

programme.title: Animals Decoded
programme.desc: From ultra-long distance whale song, to infrasonic elephants, to messages flashed on a cuttlefishs skin, animals have incredible ways of flirting, fighting, chatting and bonding. Theres a whole world of animal languages waiting to be decoded.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes at Kenyas largest and busiest private game reserve, Ol Pejeta Conservancy.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries
programme.desc: The mass relocation of an endangered species of hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta occurs so that the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: The day-to-day life of the primates at the Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Dorset. The nursery chimps get the better of animal manager Jeremy, and theres tension when a baby woolly monkey is born, but is rejected by its mother.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Theres a challenge for the staff as four chimps `move house on one day in the parks biggest move around yet, baby chimps Ash and Rodders have breakfast at home with keepers Emma and Paul, and a Russian orang-utan orphan needs a family.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia
programme.desc: Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool and wet Kasanka National Park.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: The Jungle School team races to rescue a baby orangutan. Three-month-old Monita joins the other orphans at the school, including Alba, the worlds only known albino orangutan.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Diving into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. The team fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and vet Karina uses a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Amanda goes on a white knuckle bush-whacking adventure to rescue a waterbuck caught by a poachers snare; the centres resident hyena is treated for fly-bitten ears; and Alma gets a mysterious late night monkey delivery.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: The Nsefu Pride of lions lives on the banks of the Luangwa River in Zambia. Experienced lionesses bring up a family of youngsters. Seven new cubs are born into the wet season, not the easiest time.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is ruthlessly assaulted and burnt, the SVUs investigation uncovers a decades-old secret; Bruno helps a young witness find the courage to come forward.

programme.title: Send in the Dogs UK
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of Britains police dogs in real operations, sniffing out everything from drugs and weapons to counterfeit money.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: Two young girls watch on in fear as their shop-owner dad grapples with a dangerous gunman. Also, someone is stealing money from a frail 93-year-old, and any one of a large number of visitors could be the culprit.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: A pub landlady suffers a heartbreaking theft of money meant for her seriously ill daughter, but local people join forces with the police. Also, a cafe owner with the latest security technology can see, hear and even speak to the burglars who have broken in to his premises.

programme.title: Caught Red Handed
programme.desc: A family man is caught unawares by muggers on the way home after a night out, but the thieves get a surprise of their own. Also, a launderette owner is targeted by light-fingered locals, but one hasnt looked closely at who he is stealing from.

programme.title: Stop, Search, Seize
programme.desc: Join Irelands Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country.

programme.title: UK Border Force
programme.desc: Police target illegal workers as they raid a chicken factory, while officers in Calais discover illegal immigrants when they conduct a search during rush hour of lorries bound for the UK.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: A young Brazilian girl winds up in the Customs red zone with her bag of tricks. Ukrainian fishermen are checked at the border.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: A Canadian woman does her best to bring a live cat with her across the border, while a Dutchman is caught carrying a considerable quantity of cocaine.

programme.title: Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Follow Australian Customs and Border Protection officers as they attempt to enforce the countrys various quarantine, customs, immigration and finance laws.

programme.desc: When a priest from a Catholic boarding school suddenly disappears, Humphrey and Esther find that his case has uncanny similarities to a local myth - The Devil on the Rocks. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his rail exploration of the east of England, beginning with the seafront at Felixstowe, where in January 1953, the town was engulfed in the worst flooding to hit England in the 20th century.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo completes his railway journey through the east of England during the post-war period. At RAF Lakenheath, he discovers a slice of America dropped into the British countryside, watching the US Air Forces Strike Eagles.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores the post-war Britain of his youth in a journey from the Midlands to the West Country. Beginning in Derbys railway works, Michael hears how the Victorian sheds now house some of the most modern assembly lines in Britain.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Coventry, Michael recalls the destruction by the German Luftwaffe of the citys gothic cathedral in November 1940. Heading south to Royal Leamington Spa, Michael visits the Guide Dogs for the Blind National Centre, established in the town in 1941.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian Hamilton and his guide dog, Major, are off to Blairgowrie and Rattray in Perthshire. He asks those who live in the town how they feel about the place and what its future might hold.

programme.title: My Kind of Town
programme.desc: Ian Hamilton and guide dog Major are off to Annan in Dumfries and Galloway. With its important industrial history, including boat building, fishing and even nuclear power, how is Annan adapting to the modern world?

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Force 11 storms are expected but one young skipper has a point to prove to his dad.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Father and son team Charlie and Charles McBride have a disastrous week on their boat the Arcane when they lose their best fishing net, their boat loses power and they are driven into port. With massive debts, they have no choice but to attempt to retrieve the net from the bottom of the North Sea. Also, on the Amity, Jimmy Buchan has money worries too as boat maintenance sets him back £70,000.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Chaz Bruce, who is only 23, and his crew on the New Dawn find a rope wrapped around the boats propeller, but skipper Chaz is relentless to put into port, even with a storm brewing. With his fish-hold still empty, Chaz needs to prove himself amongst the more experienced skippers.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Theres an unlikely arrival at the North Yorkshire car auction - an Argentinian Army Mercedes G wagon that saw action in the Falklands War.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek has three scooters to collect, while also finding room for a Daimler and a teardrop caravan.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team head for restoration in their Bedford Rascal Campervan. They also purchase a true British classic - a TR6 - which is almost too good to touch!

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will find an old Alfa 155 in a barn, which is entirely original. The price seems good too, but on taking a second look, the undercarriage of the vehicle appears to be in a sorry state.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough has a passion for birds eggs. These remarkable structures nurture new life, protecting it from the outside world at the same time as allowing it to breathe. They are strong enough to withstand the full weight of an incubating parent and weak enough to allow a chick to break free.

programme.title: Attenboroughs Birds of Paradise
programme.desc: David Attenborough highlights the mystery and scientific revelation surrounding the elusive birds.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Series celebrating our planet in all its glory. This episode journeys across the world, following the influence of the sun and discovering how its seasonal journey affects the lives of all who live on earth. As spring arrives in the Arctic, a mother polar bear emerges from her den with two tiny cubs. At the other end of the planet, winter arrives and Emperor penguins are plunged into darkness for four months.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Taking an epic journey following the descent of the planets mightiest rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Breathtaking river scenery is revealed by a revolutionary helicopter camera mount - from the worlds highest and broadest waterfalls to the awe-inspiring spectacle of the 10,000-strong flocks of greater snow geese in flight.

programme.title: Simon Reeves South America
programme.desc: Simon Reeve journeys through the remote and little-visited northeast of the continent, from the tabletop mountain Mount Roraima in Venezuela through Guyana, Suriname, and French Guiana.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: In the first episode, Robson Green sets out on one of the most iconic walks in the UK, the Hadrians Wall path.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will find an old Alfa 155 in a barn, which is entirely original. The price seems good too, but on taking a second look, the undercarriage of the vehicle appears to be in a sorry state.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team head for restoration in their Bedford Rascal Campervan. They also purchase a true British classic - a TR6 - which is almost too good to touch!

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A 1969 Morris Mini Cooper MkII is totally restored by specialists. They give it the full works, which means only one thing... any chance of profit heads towards an open window.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team set out on a Pre-War challenge with a 1939 three wheeled Morgan F4 - and aptly named Russ Storer from MG Mecca is still keen to take it on.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of a North Yorkshire-based, family-run historic car auction business, which uncovers some remarkably rare vehicles in Thornton-le-Dale.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A rare 1980s Sierra Cosworth draws in a crowd of Ford fans, while a restorer delights buyers with his 1966 Sunbeam Rapier and Sarah takes a shine to a caravan.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Coventry, Michael recalls the destruction by the German Luftwaffe of the citys gothic cathedral in November 1940. Heading south to Royal Leamington Spa, Michael visits the Guide Dogs for the Blind National Centre, established in the town in 1941.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway journey reaches the heart of Warwickshire. In the Tudor town of Stratford-upon-Avon, birthplace of William Shakespeare, Michael visits the Royal Shakespeare Theatre, home since 1961 to the Royal Shakespeare Company.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: At the African and Caribbean Heritage Centre in Wolverhampton, Michael finds out about the impact of Enoch Powells 1968 speech on immigration. In Kidderminster, he discovers the site of a secret wartime enterprise known as the Drakelow Tunnels.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is on the last leg of his railway journey from the train-building city of Derby to the aircraft manufacturing base of Filton. From Tewkesbury, he heads to the fairytale castle of Eastnor at the foot of the Malvern Hills.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek auctions off a Jensen Interceptor and a Jensen Healey along with a one-off Wood and Pickett Triumph Dolomite Sprint. Sarah takes a shine to a four-tonne road roller that needs a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A 1971 Mercedes SL and a 1989 Jaguar XJS emerge from a barn on a chicken farm, a Roller and a Rover go under the hammer and a 1966 Triumph Spitfire is restored to near perfection.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: Deep in the forests of East Prussia, a sprawling Nazi complex becomes the nerve centre of Hitlers empire and the site of a daring plot against the Fuhrer.

programme.title: World at War
programme.desc: Stricken by the humiliation of defeat and the harsh terms of the Treaty of Versailles, Germany looks to one man for a resurgence of hope and dignity - Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A huge turnout awaits Fiona Bruce and the team at Lincoln Cathedral. Objects under scrutiny include a gruesome set of surgeons tools from the 1860s and a plate hidden for years in a cupboard which provides its owner with a big surprise. We also meet a visitor on a quest to recover his grandfathers paintings.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit to Lincoln Cathedral for Fiona Bruce and the experts. Cameras roll as the team gets excited about a Chinese picture bought for a song, a Georgian dining table with a stunning valuation and a collection of early TV implements first used to screen the Queens Coronation.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves on his way to Grimsby to pick up an iconic 80s fast Ford, the Mk1 Fiesta XR2.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gets a tour of Hadlow Castle in Kent when he collects an immaculate Citroen that was once used by the Gestapo in occupied France, Dave considers spending his own money on a hay cart, and Paul unearths a remarkably rust-free 1970s Alfa GTV.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: A journey around the edge of the Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve. This first leg takes him from the rugged coast of South Africa, where he joins the fight against wildlife poachers, through Mozambique, and on to the tropical island of Zanzibar. On the way, he swims with sharks, meets refugees, and travels on a huge container ship fortified against the constant threat of pirates.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks

programme.title: Greece with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels from the Peloponnese peninsula to the rugged and mountainous north of the country. To learn more about Greece and the Greeks, he meets an extraordinary cast of characters, from a group of rebel monks to conservationists caring for an injured bear cub.
