programme.desc: A young man has to sell his ancestral property to survive.

programme.title: Hungama
programme.desc: A story about a group of misfits who end up in a hilarious situations and an investigation of an insane man.

programme.title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
programme.desc: A widowers daughter is given the task of reuniting her father with a woman who secretly loved him in college.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is assigned with two missions, one is to protect a fragile peace initiative with Pakistan called Project Milap, and the other is to protect the daughter of General Bakshi, the commander in charge of Project Milap. The project takes him to St. Pauls College in Darjeeling, where he must go undercover as a student. As a mature student, Major Ram becomes a misfit with the hip college students.

programme.title: Veer-Zaara
programme.desc: Squadron Leader Veer Pratap Singh, a pilot in the Indian air force, rescues the stranded Zaara, a woman from Pakistan, following a bus accident, and their lives are forever bound. With all the ingredients of a classic love story, the film is a tale of love, separation, courage and sacrifice that unfolds over 22 years.

programme.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
programme.desc: Rahul is the director of a successful music and dance group and considers Nisha his best friend. Secretly, she is madly in love with him. Following an injury, new dancer Pooja joins the company and Rahul finds himself falling for her, but she is engaged to Ajay who is the son of the family who raised Pooja following her parents death. As preparations for the new show progress, will Rahul decide on a happy ending?

programme.title: Darr
programme.desc: Beautiful college girl Kiran Awasti finds herself caught between two admirers: the dangerously obsessive Rahul Mehra and brave naval officer Sunil Malhotra. Rahul will stop at nothing to win Kiran - even murder - but she is already engaged to Sunil and, following their marriage, the battle between love and life intensifies with frightening consequences.

programme.title: Jawan
programme.desc: A man is driven by a personal vendetta to rectify the wrongs in society, while keeping a promise made years ago. He comes up against a monstrous outlaw with no fear, whos caused extreme suffering to many.

programme.title: Baazigar
programme.desc: This is a story of a young carefree handsome man who steals the hearts of women, until his life is turned upside down when everything he has is stolen from him. He uses his skills to romance the daughters of his enemies, taking revenge on the people who have taken his companies and properties from him.

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Ever dream of starting your life over in another town, with another name, in another country? For a fee, an organisation called The Company will provide all the documents necessary to create a brand new you in a brand new place.

programme.title: Vasudha
programme.desc: Vasudha, a cheerful maid, joins business leader Chandrikas home. Despite differing beliefs, she seeks Chandrikas approval and struggles to fit into her elite world.

programme.title: Tum Se Tum Tak
programme.desc: Anu, a kind 20-year-old, and Aryavardhan, a resolute 45-year-old businessman, defy societal norms and family resistance, overcoming struggles to demonstrate that love transcends age or boundaries.

programme.title: Kahani Har Ghar Ki
programme.desc: Juhi Parmar hosts and offers Indian women a safe, empathetic platform to share their untold domestic stories-from emotional neglect to societal pressures.

programme.title: Jagriti
programme.desc: To empower her marginalised Chitta community, Jagriti challenges the age-old traditions and locks horns with its leader who works for the mafia.

programme.title: Saru
programme.desc: A kabaddi champion from Rajasthan moves to Mumbai, where she battles all odds, reunites with her family, and fights to get her mother her rightful place in the family while chasing her dreams.

programme.title: Jibon Saathi
programme.desc: Priyam marries Sankalpa, but he loves her sister, Jhelum. Now, Priyam must win over her husbands heart. Will she succeed in gaining his love and building a happy marriage?

programme.title: Neem Phooler Madhu
programme.desc: Parna and Srijan have an arranged marriage, and, despite being complete opposites, they fall in love amidst the bittersweet surprises life throws at them.
